name: Bub Block
description:
Dodge the spinning blades while trying to trap your opponents with blocks! Each round is fully customizable, from how fast the blades move to how many blocks you can carry to the ability to turn into a ghost and seek revenge after you die.

Please note: this is a local multiplayer game only! However, the Remote Play Together feature works really well. We know that is not a substitute for a true online mode, though, and so that is something we are working on.

Share your ideas with us for more game modes and features you'd like to see. Enjoy!
